text: Hatfield is a small village near Leominster in Herefordshire. In the village is a caravan site called Fair View caravan site. It has a small church called Hatfield St. Leonard, built .St Leonards, Hatfield, Hereford Churches Tourism Group It is of Norman design. It is built of local sandstone. David Ross, Hatfield, St Leonard's Church, Britain Express Other nearby hamlets and towns include Bockleton, Bromyard and Leominister. The city of Hereford is south of Hatfield. The Herefordshire Trail (walking trail) runs through the village. == References == Category:Villages in Herefordshire
title: Hatfield, Herefordshire
